conversation.message_text: LensDirect: Reply Y to subscribe to recurring automated personalized marketing alerts (e.g. cart reminders) from LensDirect.
LensDirect: Welcome! Msg & data rates may apply. Msg frequency varies. Reply HELP for help, STOP to cancel.

LensDirect: Welcome. Get 20% off contacts + 25% off eyewear and lens replacement with code F0E9D4846C 

Shop here! lensdirect.attn.tv/avmek5loe0LV
LensDirect: Save our contact for exclusive offers!

LensDirect: Hi, Elaine here! It looks like you left some items in your cart - use 8A344D6A6B to save 20% on contacts and 30% on eyewear and lens replacement!

Text back if you have any questions!
Found the same glasses with same lenses for $300 less elsewhere!!!

LensDirect: Thanks for getting in touch! I'm really sorry to hear about that. Our goal is to always make you happy when it comes to price. So, if you happen to find a lower price on your contact lenses, we'll match it. To get your discount, just call or email us at info@lensdirect.com after you complete your online order, and we'll refund the difference. Include your order number and a link to the lower price. Please note that we won't price match promotions, only on a per box price. Also, we'll only do price matching on reputable retailers such as 1-800CONTACTS.com, VisionDirect.com, Walgreens.com and Coastal.com.
Contact lenses? I said glasses.
LensDirect: I'm sorry for the confusion! I'm afraid that we only price match contact lenses at this time.

send_to_cs: Send to CS for post purchase issues, use PPI shortcut
templates: For medical inquiries about contacts or lens replacement use MQ shortcut

Template used: "Shipping time"; last updated: 2024-07-09 22:16:45.728

Venus et Fleur: Thank you for reaching out! Good question! This depends on the selected shipping method. All of our arrangements ship with UPS or FedEx. Certain arrangements are eligible for same day hand delivery if the order is placed before 2 pm and is being delivered to NJ or NY. You are able to choose a delivery date for all of our arrangements at checkout, and we do offer next day delivery as long as the order is placed before 6 pm EST.

Hope this helps! If you have any questions, feel free to text me.

escalate: ESC if cx wants their account name to be changed
ESC if cx complains that their order was canceled
If cx's ask when their order will arrive/estimated delivery date
‚ûú  Ask what shipping method they selected at checkout
‚ûú If it's standard shipping use STS shortcut
‚ûú If they insist to know exactly when ESC
Cx gets a code for free shipping for the first purchase; you can escalate any issues after troubleshooting
tone: Don't thank the cx for the purchase, thank them for their continuous support
Don't ask the customer to contact the courier
drive_to_purchase: Don't D2P when the cx already made a purchase
promo_and_promo_exclusions: Free shipping code is only valid for standard shipping
Standard shipping charge is usually ~ $20, if you see a charge higher than that, it means the method selected is NOT standard (create a mock cart to double-check)

I ordered "Red and White" Friday.  Funds were deposited in your San Francisco account at Wells Fargo.
Please confirm you received same. 
Leonard Ardieta

Saatchi Art: Thanks for reaching out! I've checked, and don't see any recent orders on my end. To be sure, could you please check if you received a confirmation email? Be sure to also check your spam and promotions folders for the email.

It was late Friday. Perhaps too late to register ?
Is this Will ?

Len Ardieta
Saatchi Art: I'll be happy to check for you. Can you also provide me with your email address used for the purchase and the order number?

My email address is cyberace81406132¬°aol.com

 1,170.00 was deposited in 0990 located at 420 Montgomery Avenue, San Francisco 94104

Saatchi Art: Thank you for the information, but could you please confirm your order number? Please check your email, and don't forget to look in your spam and promotions folders, as our emails can sometimes end up there.

I have #200014048366226. 

Your bank routing #121000248
Account name as Saatchi Online account.  
Account #4942370990

Do I need to be concerned at this point. 

My bank is Wells Fargo as yours is. Should not be difficult to locate the ¬§ 1,170.00
 Please advise.
Leonard Ardieta

Saatchi Art: Thank you for providing the details. I've forwarded them to our team, and I'll let you know as soon as I hear back from them. I appreciate your patience as we work to resolve this for you. If you have any other questions or concerns in the meantime, feel free to let me know.

Painting will be shipped to Delaware to a trusted friend so as to surprise my wife with
when I present it to her in our home in Maryland.
Again, based on info given you this eveing do you see a problem ? 
Len Ardieta
Saatchi Art: Apologies, I have limited info on my end. It would be best to wait for my team's response. I appreciate your understanding.
üëç

Good Day,
Have we verified my funds were deposited into Saatchi's account in San Francisco ?

Leonard Ardieta

Saatchi Art: Thank you for reaching out. I'm really sorry for the delay. It is not the experience that we want to have for our customers. Right now, I still have no response from the team. But rest assured, once I get an update, I will message you immediately. Please hang tight!

Thank you. A little concerned.
Leonard Ardieta

Saatchi Art: I totally understand and I'm once again sorry for the inconvenience! Our team is dealing with an influx of support requests, but they're working through them and will follow up as soon as they can.

I presume that is good for business !
At 83, I've known so many wonderful artist in my younger days. Then, they would have benefited so much from a platform such as Saatchi.
Saatchi Art: Yes, sir, and I assure you again that the team should follow up soon! Customer feedback means a lot to us and helps us keep improving. Thank you so much!

Transfer was made from one Wells Fargo branch to another. Should not have been that difficult to trace. Should I get involved ?
Leonard Ardieta

Saatchi Art: I completely understand your concern - transfers between bank branches should be straightforward, and it's frustrating when tracking becomes complicated.

At this point, it's best to let the bank handle the trace since they have access to the internal transfer details. You can stay informed by confirming the transfer reference number and keeping any receipts or confirmation emails handy. If you notice any delays or discrepancies, contacting your branch directly will usually get the quickest resolution.

Understood, but no new feedback from your company ? Again, I was talking to a gentleman named Will who said he works for Saatchi.  Are you Will and if not do you know of him. He works in your California agency so he says.

Saatchi Art: Thanks for getting back to me! I sincerely apologize for the inconvenience. This definitely isn't the experience we wanted for you! My name is Sofia. My team is currently looking into this. Rest assured, we'll get back to you as soon as we have an update. Feel free to let me know if you need help with anything else in the meantime.
